item.description:
Watch the Trailer

 

UPDATE: WE'RE GOING TO THE 7:40PM SHOW AND WILL HEAD INTO THE THEATER AT ABOUT 7PM.  

This was a great book and I'm looking forward to seeing the film adaptation.

We'll be gathering upstairs by the windows and main concessions 1 hour before and head in 30 minutes before start time. 

If you miss us then, find us in the hallway after for a brief chat and consider joining the after event at a local restaurant. 

Please BRING CASH to make the restaurant portion considerably easier since it's a group.

Hope to see you there!

After one day together -- July 15th, 1988, their college graduation -- Emma Morley and Dexter Mayhew begin a friendship that will last a lifetime. She is a working-class girl of principle and ambition who dreams of making the world a better place. He is a wealthy charmer who dreams that the world will be his playground. For the next two decades, key moments of their relationship are experienced over several July 15ths in their lives. Together and apart, we see Dex and Em through their friendship and fights, hopes and missed opportunities, laughter and tears. Somewhere along their journey, these two people realize that what they are searching and hoping for has beenthere for them all along. As the true meaning of that one day back in 1988 is revealed, they come to terms with the nature of love and life itself.
item.how_to_find_us: UPDATE: We're going to the 7:40PM Show. We will gather around the tables upstairs by concessions for 20-30 minutes and I'll have a Meetup sign. After the movie, we'll gather outside in the hallway briefly before heading for food & drinks.
item.name: One Day
